00041     template <typename SCALARTYPE, bool is_iterator1, int increment>
00042     class const_sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator
00043     {
00044       typedef const_sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator<SCALARTYPE, is_iterator1, increment>    self_type;
00045       
00046       public:
00047         typedef self_type     iterator1;
00048         typedef self_type     iterator2;
00049         
00050         const_sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator(std::vector<std::map<unsigned int, SCALARTYPE> > const & mat, int i, int j)
00051          : _mat(mat), _i(i), _j(j)
00052         {
00053           if (i < 0) //reverse iterator end
00054           {
00055            // iter2 = _mat[0].rend();  //reverse iterator end
00056           }
00057           else  //_i is valid
00058           {
00059             if (j < 0)
00060             {
00061               //iter2 = _mat[i].rend();
00062             }
00063             else //_j is valid
00064             {
00065               if (_i < _mat.size() && _j < _mat.size() )
00066               {
00067                 //TODO: Start at entry j, not at the begin
00068                 iter2 = _mat[i].begin();
00069               }
00070               else if (_i < _mat.size() && _j >= _mat.size())
00071                 iter2 = _mat[i].end();
00072               else //i is out of range -> end iterator requested
00073                 iter2 = _mat[_mat.size() - 1].end(); //forward iterator end
00074             }
00075           }
00076         }
00077          
00078         SCALARTYPE operator*(void) const
00079         {
00080           if (is_iterator1)
00081           {
00082             typedef typename std::map<unsigned int, SCALARTYPE>::const_iterator  col_iterator;
00083             
00084             col_iterator colit = _mat[_i].find(_j);
00085 
00086             if (colit != _mat[_i].end())
00087               return colit->second;
00088             return 0.0;
00089           }
00090           else
00091             return iter2->second;
00092         }
00093         
00094         self_type & operator++(void)
00095         {
00096           if (is_iterator1)
00097             _i += increment;
00098           else
00099             ++iter2;
00100           return *this;
00101         }
00102         self_type & operator++(int) { self_type tmp = *this; ++(*this); return tmp; }
00103         
00104         bool operator==(self_type const & other) const
00105         {
00106           if (is_iterator1)
00107             return (_i == other._i);
00108           return (iter2 == other.iter2);
00109         }
00110         bool operator!=(self_type const & other) const { return !(*this == other); }
00111         
00112         unsigned int index1() const { return _i; }
00113         unsigned int index2() const
00114         { 
00115           if (is_iterator1)
00116             return 0;
00117           else
00118             return iter2->first;
00119         }
00120         
00121         const_sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator<SCALARTYPE, !is_iterator1, 1> begin() const
00122         {
00123           return const_sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator<SCALARTYPE, !is_iterator1, 1>(_mat, _i, iter2->first);
00124         }
00125         const_sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator<SCALARTYPE, !is_iterator1, 1> end() const
00126         {
00127           return const_sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator<SCALARTYPE, !is_iterator1, 1>(_mat, _i, static_cast<unsigned int>(_mat.size()));
00128         }
00129         
00130       private:
00131         std::vector<std::map<unsigned int, SCALARTYPE> > const & _mat;
00132         typename std::map<unsigned int, SCALARTYPE>::const_iterator iter2;
00133         unsigned int _i;
00134         unsigned int _j;
00135     };
00136     
00141     template <typename SCALARTYPE>
00142     class const_sparse_matrix_adapter
00143     {
00144       public:
00145         typedef const_sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator<SCALARTYPE, true, 1>      const_iterator1;
00146         typedef const_sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator<SCALARTYPE, false, 1>     const_iterator2;
00147 
00148         typedef const_sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator<SCALARTYPE, true, -1>   const_reverse_iterator1;
00149         typedef SCALARTYPE    value_type;
00150         
00151         const_sparse_matrix_adapter(std::vector<std::map<unsigned int, SCALARTYPE> > const & mat) 
00152          : _mat(mat) {};
00153         
00154         unsigned int size1() const { return static_cast<unsigned int>(_mat.size()); }
00155         unsigned int size2() const { return static_cast<unsigned int>(_mat.size()); }  //we allow only square matrices
00156         
00157         const_iterator1 begin1() const { return const_iterator1(_mat, 0, 0); }
00158         const_iterator1 end1() const   { return const_iterator1(_mat, size1(), size2()); }
00159 
00160         const_reverse_iterator1 rbegin1() const { return const_reverse_iterator1(_mat, size1() - 1, 0); }
00161         const_reverse_iterator1 rend1() const   { return const_reverse_iterator1(_mat, -1, size2()); }
00162 
00163         const_iterator2 begin2() const { return const_iterator2(_mat, 0, 0); }
00164         const_iterator2 end2() const   { return const_iterator2(_mat, 0, size2()); }
00165         
00166         SCALARTYPE operator()(unsigned int i, unsigned int j) const
00167         {
00168           typedef typename std::map<unsigned int, SCALARTYPE>::const_iterator  col_iterator;
00169           
00170           col_iterator colit = _mat[i].find(j);
00171 
00172           if (colit != _mat[i].end())
00173             return colit->second;
00174           return 0.0;
00175         }
00176 
00177       private:
00178         std::vector<std::map<unsigned int, SCALARTYPE> > const & _mat;
00179     };

00189     template <typename SCALARTYPE, bool is_iterator1>
00190     class sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator
00191     {
00192       typedef sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator<SCALARTYPE, is_iterator1>    self_type;
00193       
00194       public:
00195         typedef self_type     iterator1;
00196         typedef self_type     iterator2;
00197         
00198         sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator(std::vector<std::map<unsigned int, SCALARTYPE> > & mat, int i, int j)
00199          : _mat(mat), _i(i), _j(j)
00200         {
00201           if (i < 0) //reverse iterator end
00202           {
00203             //iter2 = _mat[0].rend();  //reverse iterator end
00204           }
00205           else  //_i is valid
00206           {
00207             if (j < 0)
00208             {
00209               //iter2 = _mat[i].rend();
00210             }
00211             else //_j is valid
00212             {
00213               if (_i < _mat.size() && _j < _mat.size() )
00214               {
00215                 //TODO: Start at entry j, not at the begin
00216                 iter2 = _mat[i].begin();
00217               }
00218               else if (_i < _mat.size() && _j >= _mat.size())
00219                 iter2 = _mat[i].end();
00220               else //i is out of range -> end iterator requested
00221                 iter2 = _mat[_mat.size() - 1].end(); //forward iterator end
00222             }
00223           }
00224         }
00225          
00226         SCALARTYPE & operator*(void)
00227         {
00228           if (is_iterator1)
00229           {
00230             return _mat[_i][_j];
00231           }
00232           else
00233             return iter2->second;
00234         }
00235         
00236         self_type & operator++(void)
00237         {
00238           if (is_iterator1)
00239             ++_i;
00240           else
00241             ++iter2;
00242           return *this;
00243         }
00244         self_type & operator++(int) { self_type tmp = *this; ++(*this); return tmp; }
00245         
00246         bool operator==(self_type const & other) const
00247         {
00248           if (is_iterator1)
00249             return (_i == other._i);
00250           return (iter2 == other.iter2);
00251         }
00252         bool operator!=(self_type const & other) const { return !(*this == other); }
00253         
00254         unsigned int index1() const { return _i; }
00255         unsigned int index2() const
00256         { 
00257           if (is_iterator1)
00258             return 0;
00259           else
00260             return iter2->first;
00261         }
00262         
00263         sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator<SCALARTYPE, !is_iterator1> begin() const
00264         {
00265           return sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator<SCALARTYPE, !is_iterator1>(_mat, _i, iter2->first);
00266         }
00267         sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator<SCALARTYPE, !is_iterator1> end() const
00268         {
00269           return sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator<SCALARTYPE, !is_iterator1>(_mat, _i, static_cast<int>(_mat.size()));
00270         }
00271         
00272       private:
00273         std::vector<std::map<unsigned int, SCALARTYPE> > & _mat;
00274         typename std::map<unsigned int, SCALARTYPE>::iterator iter2;
00275         unsigned int _i;
00276         unsigned int _j;
00277     };

00285     template <typename SCALARTYPE>
00286     class sparse_matrix_adapter : public const_sparse_matrix_adapter<SCALARTYPE>
00287     {
00288         typedef const_sparse_matrix_adapter<SCALARTYPE>   BaseType;
00289       public:
00290         typedef sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator<SCALARTYPE, true>      iterator1;
00291         typedef sparse_matrix_adapted_iterator<SCALARTYPE, false>     iterator2;
00292         
00293         sparse_matrix_adapter(std::vector<std::map<unsigned int, SCALARTYPE> > & mat) 
00294          : BaseType(mat), _mat(mat) { };
00295         
00296         iterator1 begin1() const { return iterator1(_mat, 0, 0); }
00297         iterator1 end1() const   { return iterator1(_mat, _mat.size(), _mat.size()); }
00298 
00299         iterator2 begin2() const { return iterator2(_mat, 0, 0); }
00300         iterator2 end2() const   { return iterator2(_mat, _mat.size(), _mat.size()); }
00301         
00302         SCALARTYPE & operator()(unsigned int i, unsigned int j) { return _mat[i][j]; }
00303         
00304         void resize(unsigned int i, unsigned int j, bool preserve = true)
00305         {
00306           if (i>0)
00307             _mat.resize(i);
00308           if (!preserve)
00309             clear();
00310         }
00311         
00312         void clear()
00313         {
00314           for (unsigned int i=0; i<_mat.size(); ++i)
00315             _mat[i].clear();
00316         }
00317         
00318       private:
00319         std::vector<std::map<unsigned int, SCALARTYPE> > & _mat;
00320     };
